title: Bauchi Airport
text:
Bauchi Airport is an airport serving <a href="Bauchi">Bauchi</a> in <a href="Nigeria">Nigeria</a>. The former NE/SW runway is now used as a taxiway, and carries taxiway markings.
Scheduled airline service has been moved to the new <a href="Bauchi%20State%20Airport">Bauchi State Airport</a> north near the village of Durum. The <a href="IATA">IATA</a> airport code has been transferred to the new airport.
